diff_hunk:

+

+

+
+namespace thpp {

+  friend class THCSTensor<unsigned char>;
body:
Can you replace that with this:
```cpp
template<typename U>
friend struct THCSTensor;
```

I wanted to do that change for some time now, because it raises lots of warnings when using clang. That'd be one place less.

friend struct THCSTensor;
